name: Sprint 01 Project
description: This is a painting tool that allows the user to create 3D objects of varying sizes, shapes, and colors. Holding right click paints a continuous stream of objects while single left click spawns one object at a time. The colors (Red, Green, and Blue) can be adjusted in the bottom left corner via sliders. The drop-down menu can be used to choose between a capsule, cube, or sphere. There is an 'Erase All' feature as well as an option to stop the automatic destruction of objects after 3 seconds. Last but not least, the top left corner displays the user's mouse position in x & y coordinates.
